response:
"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass die privatsphäre in zeitalter von big data und social mediaeschützt ist? wir teilen unsere persönlichen daten gerne mit der welt - aber wer garantiert uns, dass sie nicht in falsche hände fallen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation:

"how can we still talk about protecting privacy in the age of big data and social media? we happily share our personal data with the world - but who guarantees that it won't fall into the wrong hands? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the idea that personal information is still protected in today's digital age. the user questions the notion that privacy can be maintained when individuals freely share their data on social media platforms and other online sources. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
